Title: Video Stop
Writer: Nathan Boyer (story), Adam Newell (story), Sean McDonald (story), Mike Akers (story), Adam Newell
Actors: Nathan Boyer, Andy Maraldo, Chelsea Anderson, Matthew D. Thompson
Plot: Video Stop is a coming-of-age comedy about the life of R.J. MacReady, a young man working a dead-end job at a local video store. Colorful co-workers and customers revolve through Video Stop...
